name: Name
embededPdfFileDescription: Structured data for editing resume at xyz.com.
toggleButtonInfo: Use this button to toggle between editing and previewing your resume. You can also swipe between them!
dropzoneText: Click or drag your file here.

appearance.title: Appearance
appearance.description: Select paper size and a template that you want to use. We will also allow you to change it at the end, after filling all the crucial info.

projects.description: Provide some interesting projects you've been involved in.

legalClause.title: Legal clause
legalClause.description: In some europen countries you must explicility allow company to process your data during the recruitment process. Skip this if you don't need that.

export.title: Export
export.description: All done! Now export your resume or choose a different look to see which one works best.

start.title: Let's create your resume!
start.subtitle: Complete the forms below to export your resume.

before-template.title: Choose the design!
before-template.subtitle: We're sure you'll find a perfect one just for you.

after-template.title: Great choice!
after-template.subtitle: Now personalize the list of sections.

50%.title: You are halfway through!
50%.subtitle: The other half is the small one.

75%.title: You're almost done!
75%.subtitle: We're missing just a few details.

100%.title: You're all set!
100%.subtitle: Customize and export your resume below.

newSection.title: Sections
newSection.description: Customize sections on your resume. You can rearrange, add new or delete them.
newSection.deletionConfirmation: Are you sure you want to delete this section?

dataImport.title: Import old resume
dataImport.fileDropText: Click here or drop your pdf. Make sure you import file exported from our application.
dataImport.invalidFile: Please provide a valid pdf file created on our website.
dataImport.extractionError: Can't find embeded data. Please make sure you import file exported from our application
dataImport.validationError: There seems to be something wrong with the data in this file.
